item.title: How I Manage This Blog
item.description: TL;DR Markdown files in a Git repository Static site generation with Hugo Automatic publication to GitHub Pages If these words make you go woozy, then this is not for you. Markdown files in a Git repository Static site generation with Hugo Automatic publication to GitHub Pages
item.content:
TL;DR

  • Markdown files in a Git repository
  • Static site generation with Hugo
  • Automatic publication to GitHub Pages

If these words make you go woozy, then this is not for you.
